column4: I just did the upgrade from feisty to gutsy everything went except now I can't boot into windows any more any ideas for a fix for this/
make sure you still have a windows entry in your grub config file, i think it's /boot/grub/menu.lst
do you have any more ideas on how I can get back into windows
yes it was always there and it still won't boot into windows
it's not commented out with a # is it?
did it list the windows option?
when did you do that, have you rebooted since?
reboot, should be an option now ;)
